tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lesson_plans (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    plan_description TEXT,
    plan_content_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (plan_content_id) REFERENCES curriculum_content(content_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lesson_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_title VARCHAR(255),
  plan_description TEXT,
  content_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES curriculum_content(content_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assessment_data (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_title VARCHAR(255),
  assessment_date DATE,
  plan_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES lesson_plans(plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE curriculum_content (
  content_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  content_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  content_description TEXT,
  content_type VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE lesson_plans (
  plan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  plan_description TEXT,
  plan_content_id INT REFERENCES curriculum_content(content_id),
  plan_created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE assessment_data (
  assessment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  assessed_plan_id INT REFERENCES lesson_plans(plan_id),
  assessment_score DECIMAL,
  assessment_date DATE,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE educational_programs (
  program_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  program_description TEXT,
  program_start_date DATE,
  program_end_date DATE,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);
